<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapon Pool

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds magazines from the campaign pool to the given unit, depending on his weapons.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''fillWeaponsFromPool''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[fillWeaponsFromPool]] _soldier</code>
</value></part></template>
